data.title: PAI Partners
data.meta_description: Our highly experienced investment teams are structured to give us unparalleled access to transactions in our core markets, while also enabling a pro-active approach to investment opportunities across Europe and beyond.
data.text:
Alize joined PAI in 2023 as a member of the Corporate Operations Team.

She joined as a Legal Analyst after completing her internship at PAI Partners.

Alize graduated from Nancy University (faculty of law). She holds a masters degree in European business laws.

Lydwine joined PAI in 2023 as Chief Financial Officer and is a member of the Corporate Operations Team.

She joined from Alma Capital, where she was Chief Financial Officer and General Counsel for nine years. Prior to this, Lydwine worked in KPMGs audit and advisory practice in Paris, New York and Luxembourg for 15 years.

Lydwine graduated from ESSEC Business School and holds DCG and DSCG Chartered Accountant diplomas.

Ana joined PAI in 2015 as a member of the Investment Group. She is also a member of the Food & Consumer Team and has worked on the Ecotone, Froneri, Roompot, StellaGroup and The Looping Group investments.

She started her career at Roland Berger in Paris as a strategy consultant, where she spent two years.

Ana graduated from ESSEC in 2013.

Abigal joined PAI in 2018 as a member of the Investment Group. She has been involved in the Alphia, Euro Ethnic Foods and Pasubio investments.

She started her career at Big Mamma, a fast-growing group of Italian restaurants, where she was the CFO for three years.

Abigal graduated from HEC in 2014.

Christian joined PAI in 2020 as a member of the PAI Performance Group with a particular focus on topline related topics.

He has strong management consulting experience and was previously at Simon Kucher, where he was a Director. Prior to Simon Kucher, Christian held various positions at PwC Strategy Group and Bain & Co and he has also worked with a number of leading multinational businesses on an interim / contractor basis. Over the course of his career, Christian has led and participated in a number of projects covering a range of business issues and industries including pricing, sales excellence, operational improvement, analysis of business growth options, corporate strategy and M&A.

Christian has a BSc in International Business from Warwick Business School & ESSEC.

Annabelle joined PAI in 2022 as a member of the Investment Group. She has been involved in The Looping Group investment.

She joined from J.P. Morgan where she worked as an Investment Banking Analyst in the EMEA Consumer & Retail team. Prior to that, she also completed internships at J.P. Morgan, Astorg and Rothschild & Co.

Annabelle holds a Masters degree in Management from ESCP Business School.

Morgane joined PAI in 2022 as a member of the Corporate Operations Team.

She started her career as an officer at Alter Domus Luxembourg where she eventually became Manager and spent almost 8 years in the Private Equity Corporate and Fund Services Department.

Morgane holds a Bachelors Degree in Economics, Accountancy and Tax Affairs. She is fluent in French and English.

Eliot joined PAI in 2018 and is a member of the Business Services Team. He has been involved in several investments including Amplitude Surgical, Ethypharm, Infra Group, MyFlower, SGD Pharma and Veonet.

Previously, Eliot worked in the Investment Banking Division of Morgan Stanley for four years in Paris and New York.

Eliot graduated from HEC in 2014.

Marlne joined PAI in 2019 and is a member of the Business Services Team. She is also a Co-Head of the Investment Group. She was involved in the Apave, Armacell and ECF transactions.

She joined from private equity firm Alpha in Paris where she spent seven years working on a variety of transactions in the consumer and industrials space. Prior to Alpha, she worked two years in investment banking at Goldman Sachs in London. Marlene started her career as an auditor at Mazars LLP in New York.

She holds a double Masters degree in Financial Engineering from Ecole Nationale des Ponts et Chausses & Accounting and Finance from the London School of Economics and Political Science.

Franois joined PAI in 2023 as a member of the Mid-Market Fund Team.

He has extensive experience of the mid-market segment having worked in the space since 2017 at Argos Wityu, where he focused on a variety of transactions in the consumer and industrials sectors. Prior to that, he worked at Estin & Co as a strategy consultant for two years.

Franois graduated from HEC in 2014. He also holds a Masters degree in corporate and tax law from Universit Paris I Panthon-Sorbonne.

Maud joined PAI in 2021 as a member of the Investment Group. She has been involved in the Alphia and The Looping Group investments.

She worked previously at Deutsche Bank in London, where she spent two years as an M&A Analyst in the Global Industrials Group, mostly focusing on Business Services.

Maud holds a double Masters Degree from ESSEC and Bocconi.

Philip joined PAI in 2018 as a member of the Investment Group and the Nordics Team. He has been involved in the Asmodee, NovaTaste, Perstorp and World Freight Company transactions.

He started his career in the Investment Banking Division of J.P. Morgan in London, where he spent two years, first in the Oil & Gas team and then in the Nordic M&A team. He then spent two years working in private equity for Rhne Group in London.

Philip studied Finance at the Stockholm School of Economics.

Dumitru joined PAI in 2022 as a member of the Compliance Team.

He joined from Alter Domus where he worked as Compliance & Regulatory Senior Officer for almost two years. Prior to his tenure at Alter Domus, he performed an internship at Amazon as Program Manager.

Dumitru holds a Bachelors degree in Materials and Mechanical Engineering from University of Metz and a Master in Aeronautical and Aerospace Engineering from Institut Suprieur de lAronautique et de lEspace.

Marc joined PAI in 2020 as a member of the Portfolio Performance Group.

He brings over 25 years of experience as an IT and digital expert in large and small organisations, including LBOs. He previously served as Chief Operating Officer at Mobility Work (GMAO) and, prior to that, as Chief Information Officer at Carambar & Co. Marc has also held senior positions at Vistali, Wavestone, Accenture and AlixPartners.

Marc holds a Masters Degree in Computer Science & Physics from the Ecole Nationale Suprieure des Mines de Nancy.

Benoit joined PAI in 2020 as a member of the Investment Group. He is now a member of the Healthcare Team. He has been involved in the Tropicana Brands Group and Zahneins investments.

He joined from Morgan Stanley where he spent four years in the EMEA Healthcare Team, most recently as a Vice-President. Prior to Morgan Stanley, he spent four years at Alpha Private Equity in Paris where he focused on a variety of transactions, notably in the consumer, business services and industrials sectors.

He holds an MBA from INSEAD and a Masters Degree in Finance and Strategy as well as a Bachelors Degree from Sciences Po Paris.

Romo joined PAI in 2022 as an Analyst in the Portfolio Performance Group (PPG), working across ESG & Sustainability, Supply Chain, Pricing, Digital, Operations and Talent. Before joining the PPG, he completed an internship with PAIs ESG Team.

Prior to PAI, Romo interned in PwCs Sustainable Performance & Strategy practice, where he focused on due diligence for private equity firms and sustainability-linked projects for financial institutions.

He holds a Masters degree in management from ESCP and a Bachelors degree in Applied Mathematics and Computer Science from Universit de la Sorbonne.

Maud joined PAI in 2019 and heads PAIs US Team. She has been involved in the Refresco and Tropicana Brands Group transactions.

She was previously with Investcorp where she spent more than 18 years, most recently as a Managing Director in New York and a member of the firms Investment Committee. She started her career in M&A at Salomon Brothers and Merrill Lynch in London.

Maud graduated from ESCP and holds a Masters in Corporate Law from the University Paris XI.

Fabienne joined PAI in 2023 as a member of the Corporate Operations Team.

She previously worked at EQT, where she was Office Manager and assisted in the creation of the Paris office. Prior to this, Fabienne held a number of HR and office management positions in consulting companies, including BCG and Bain & Company, having previously worked as an executive assistant.

Fabienne holds a Diploma of Advanced Technician (French BTS) in Administration and Foreign Languages and studied Journalism at the University of Lowell, Massachusetts.

Laurie joined PAI in 2022 as a member of the ESG Team.

He joined from PwCs Sustainability and Climate Change practice, where he focused on Responsible Investment, ESG and Impact measurement for three years. Prior to this, Laurie worked for four years within the PwC Deals practice, where he qualified as an ACA Chartered Accountant and led financial due diligence projects.

Laurie holds a degree in Economics from the University of Kent and is an IEMA (Institute of Environmental Management and Assessment) qualified practitioner.

Jessica joined PAI in 2021 as a member of the Mid-Market Fund Team. She has been involved in the Beautynova and Scrigno investments.

Prior to joining the MMF Team, she interned at PAI for one year, participating in the acquisition process of Pasubio, and previously completed an internship at Ardian.

Jessica holds a Bachelors Degree and a MSc in Business Administration and Management from Bocconi University in Milan.

Simone joined PAI in 2019 and heads PAIs Italy Team. He has been involved in the Pasubio investment.

Simone was previously a Partner and Investment Committee Member at Charme Capital Partners. Before starting at Charme Capital in 2009, Simone spent almost 10 years at Merrill Lynch in Investment Banking in London and Milan.

Simone graduated from the Bocconi University in Milan with a degree in Business Administration.

Mathieu joined PAI in 2022 as a member of the Investor Team in the Client & Capital Group.

He brings over 11 years of institutional investor background coming from Assurances du Crdit Mutuel where he was leading the Private Equity & Infrastructure fund and co-investment programme for the last 7 years. He started his career on the public markets as Equity & Convertible Bond portfolio manager.

Mathieu holds a Master in Corporate Finance from ESCP.

Michele joined PAI in 2020 as a member of the Mid-Market Fund Team. He has been involved in the Beautynova, European Pizza Group and Scrigno investments.

He was previously at Digital Colony Partners where he worked as an Associate in the London Private Equity Team. Michele also brings three years of experience as an analyst for Credit Suisse.

Michele graduated from Bocconi University in Milan with a MSc in Finance and a BSc in Finance and Economics. He also completed an exchange programme in France with HEC Paris.

Claudia joined PAI in 2021 as a member of the Mid-Market Fund Team. She has been involved in the Uvesco investment.

She joined from Credit Suisse in London, where she worked for three years in M&A across multiple sectors.

Claudia holds a BSc in International Management and French from the University of Bath.

Javier joined PAI in 2021 as a member of the Investment Group. He has been involved in the Atos Medical and HKA investments.

Prior to joining the Investment Group, he interned at PAI and completed several other internships in the M&A team of Rothschild & Co and Altamar Capital Partners.

Javier graduated in Business Administration & Finance from CUNEF in Madrid.

Genevive joined PAI in 2012. She started out at PAI as a Project Assistant and is now a Communications Coordinator.

Genevive works transversally with the different deal teams as well as the Investor Team. She is in charge of print, videos, website, templates and visual guidelines. Prior to this, Genevive worked as a graphic designer and webmaster at Sociovision, a market research company.

She has a BA degree in English and Russian, a diploma in graphic design and is a specialist in computer graphics.

Joseph joined PAI in 2016 as a member of the Corporate Operations Team.

Prior to joining PAI, Joseph worked for a third-party service provider servicing clients in the alternative investment funds industry.

Joseph holds a post-graduate degree in Business and Tax Law from Universit Montesquieu Bordeaux IV, a Diplome de Juriste Conseil dEntreprise (DJCE 2012) as well as a LL.M in European Banking and Financial Law from University of Luxembourg (2014).

Eric joined PAI in 2019 as a member of the Compliance Team and is a Conducting Officer for PAI Luxembourg, in charge of Risk Management and Compliance.

Previously, he worked as a Senior Manager within BDO Audit and Deloitte, and as Head of Compliance at Mazars in Luxembourg.

He holds a Masters Degree in Management and Controlling from the University of Strasbourg and is a Rviseur dEntreprises (Chartered Accountant) in Luxembourg.

Achatou joined PAI in 2020 as Head of Compliance.

Achatou brings 20 years of compliance & finance experience within the financial services and funds industry, most recently as the COO of Andera Partners (formerly Edmond de Rothschild Investment Partners) where she managed compliance and corporate legal matters.

Prior to Andera, Achatou held various compliance and finance positions at Groupama Private Equity and Ernst & Young where she was an auditor. Achatou has wide expertise in all regulatory aspects, including the set-up and spin-off of investment companies, as well as strong knowledge of risk mitigation.

Achatou holds a Masters Degree in Banking and Finance from Universit de Paris II Assas and an Executive MBA from the University of Chicago Booth School of Business. She is also a member of the Socit Franaise des Analystes Financiers (SFAF).

Stefano joined PAI in 2005. In early 2020, he became one of the Founding Partners of the Mid-Market Fund Team. For PAI MMF, he has led the Amplitude Surgical, La Compagnie des Desserts and MyFlower investments.

Previously, he was the Partner responsible for investments in the Healthcare sector for the flagship fund and as such has been involved in several investments, most recently Zahneins, ELITechGroup, Ethypharm, Atos Medical, DomusVi and Cerba Healthcare. Outside of healthcare, he has been involved in the Kiloutou and Provimi investments.

He started his career within the R&D department of France Telecom (now Orange) for three years, and then spent four years with McKinsey & Company in their Italian and Singaporean offices, before joining PAI in 2005.

Stefano holds an MSc in Engineering from both Politecnico di Torino (Italy) and Telecom Paritech (France), as well as an MBA from INSEAD.

Galle joined PAI in 2004 and is the Head of the Food & Consumer Team. She has been involved in a number of investments including Alphia, Asmodee, B&B Hotels, Chr. Hansen, Ecotone, European Camping Group, Euro Ethnic Foods, Froneri, Labeyrie Fine Foods, NovaTaste, Perstorp, Roompot, The Compleat Food Group and United Biscuits.

She started her career at Unibail, where she spent two years, before spending four years at Group Casino.

Galle graduated from ESSEC in 1997.

Isabelle joined PAI in 2021 as a member of the Portfolio Performance Group with a specific focus on talent, leadership, and culture.

She was previously with Spencer Stuart and brings more than eight years of experience in Leadership Advisory Services. Her focus is on executive assessment and development, team effectiveness, organisational design, and succession planning.

Isabelle is an occupational psychologist and holds a MA degree in Business Psychology from Cologne Business School and Instituto Universitrio de Lisboa.

Valentin joined PAI in 2022 as a member of the Investment Group. He has been involved in the NovaTaste investment.

He started his career at Naxicap Partners where he spent two years working on several acquisition processes in various sectors.

Prior to this, Valentin interned at Rothschild & Co in M&A and at PAI where he was involved in the Ecotone transaction.

Valentin holds a Masters Degree in Management from EM Lyon Business School.

Matthew joined PAI in 2023 as a member of the Investment Group. He has been involved in the Alphia investment.

He joined from Citi where he worked within the Global Industrials Group in New York.

Matthew holds a Bachelor of Science in Finance from the University of Florida.

Jacopo joined PAI in 2016 as a member of the Investment Group and the Italy Team. He has been involved in the Beautynova, European Pizza Group, Marcolin, Scrigno and Tendam investments and became a member of the Mid-Market Fund Team in 2021.

He started his career at Bahlsen GmbH in Hannover (Germany) covering a number of roles in Sales & Marketing as well as Business Development.

Jacopo holds a degree in Business Administration from the University of Miami and an MBA from INSEAD.

Daniel joined PAI in 2024 and is a member of the General Industrials Team, based in London.

Prior to joining PAI, Daniel spent 10 years in the Industrials Team at Advent International in London, where he was a Director. At Advent Daniel completed multiple successful investments, with a particular focus on Aerospace & Defence, Industrial Conglomerates, and Industrial Tech.

Prior to Advent, Daniel worked at The Boston Consulting Group in Paris and Casablanca, advising Industrial companies on strategy and operations. Prior to BCG, Daniel held various roles at Cinven, Goldman Sachs, and Rothschild.

Daniel graduated from HEC Paris with a Master of Science in Management.

Chamika joined PAI in 2021 as a member of the Investment Group and the UK Team. He has been involved in the ECF, HKA and Theramex investments.

He was previously at Rothschild & Co in London where he spent more than three years in the Consumer, Retail and Leisure M&A Team. During his time at Rothschild, Chamika also undertook a secondment to Ocado Retail, the worlds leading online grocer, where he was Chief of Staff to the CEO and assisted the management team with various strategic projects. He started his career at Cameron Partners, the Global Alliance Partner of Rothschild & Co in New Zealand, where he focussed on M&A for two years.

Chamika graduated from the Victoria University of Wellington with a Bachelor of Laws with first class honours and a Bachelor of Commerce. He has also completed all three levels of the CFA examinations.

John joined PAI in 2022 as a member of the Investment Group and the UK Team. He has been involved in the Azets investment.

He joined us from L Catterton where he was an Investment Associate. Prior to this, John worked at Goldman Sachs in the Consumer, Retail and Healthcare M&A team.

John holds a Master of Laws from Harvard Law School, a Master of Corporate Law from the University of Cambridge, and a BCL in law and history from University College Dublin.

Anna joined PAI in 2020 as a member of the Corporate Operations Team.

Anna started her career at KPMG (Moscow) where she spent three years as an Auditor for the industrial markets. She then worked for Deloitte in Paris for nearly four years as a Financial Audit Manager, where she focused on asset management and was a team leader.

She holds a Masters Degree in Money, Bank and Finance from Panthon Sorbonne Paris 1 as well as a Masters Degree in Financial Markets from the National Research University  Higher School of Economics (Moscow).

Jos joined PAI in 2020 as a member of the Mid-Market Fund Team. He has been involved in the Angulas Aguinaga and Uvesco investments.

He has extensive experience of the mid-market segment, having worked in the space since 2014, most notably at Abac Capital in Spain, where he was focused on the origination, execution, financing, monitoring and divestment of several deals.

Prior to that, he worked at the Boston Consulting Group as an Associate Consultant for two years.

Jos holds an MBA from MIT Sloan School of Management (Boston) as well as a Bachelors Degree and a MSc in Business Administration from ESADE Business School (Barcelona).

Alison joined PAI in 2023 as a member of the Corporate Operation Team.

She joined from Cartonnages Gallia, where she was the Administrative and Financial Manager. Prior to that, Alison worked for eight years at RZ Expertise Comptable et Conseil, PAIs accounting and payroll agency.

Alison is a Chartered Accountant and holds DSCG and DEC certifications.

Julie joined PAI in 2021 as a member of the Food & Consumer Team. She has been involved in the NovaTaste transaction.

She joined PAI after 12 years of experience in M&A. She was previously an M&A Director at Casino Group. Prior to Casino, she worked at the boutique investment bank Messier Maris & Associs.

Julie holds a Masters Degree in Finance from Sciences Po Paris.

Penelope joined PAI in 2023 as a member of the ESG Team.

She has over 18 years of experience developing and delivering sustainability strategies across a range of industries, having worked at Danone, BT, Marks & Spencer and Vodafone. She joined PAI following two years as a sustainability adviser. Her focus across her career has been on energy, climate change, environmental management, change management and communications.

Penelope started her career at Lendlease in Sydney before moving to London and Paris. Penelope graduated from the University of Sydney (Australia) and holds a Masters degree in international studies from the University of Technology in Sydney (Australia).

Claire joined PAI in 2024 as a member of the Investment Group.

She joined from Goldman Sachs, where she was an Associate and worked on financing and M&A mandates in Paris and New York. Prior to this, Claire interned at Ardian, Perella Weinberg Partners and Citi.

Claire holds a Masters in Finance and Strategy from Sciences Po Paris.

Maximilian joined PAI in 2016 and is a member of the UK Team. He has worked on several investments including Froneri, M Group Services, The Compleat Food Group, Theramex and VPS. He is also a Co-Head of the Investment Group.

He started his career at Goldman Sachs in the Consumer & Retail M&A advisory team where he spent five years.

Maximilian graduated from the University of Sydney with first class Honours in Econometrics and a specialisation in Finance.

Anna joined PAI in 2024 as a member of the ESG Team. She focuses on the development and implementation of the firms sustainability strategy and supporting sustainability within the portfolio.

Before joining the ESG Team, she completed an internship with the team in London. Prior to PAI, Anna spent a year in the Environmental Investigations Team at Wessex Water, where she analysed the companys interaction with the local freshwater system and biodiversity.

Anna holds a BSc in Biology from the University of Bath.

Ralph joined PAI in 2020 and heads PAIs DACH Team. He has been involved in the Apleona, Infra Group and NovaTaste investments.

He previously worked at Knorr-Bremse, a world leading supplier to the commercial and rail vehicle industry, where he was CFO and member of the Executive Board. He led and executed the companys initial public offering in 2018. During the previous ten years, he was CFO and member of the Executive Board of MDAX listed Drr, a leading global mechanical and plant engineering firm.

Prior to that Ralph was Managing Director, Partner and a member of the Management Committee at the Boston Consulting Group where he spent 17 years in various roles in Germany and helped build the firms operations in India.

Ralph holds a ME degree in Mechanical Engineering from RWTH Aachen and an MBA from INSEAD.

Richard joined PAI in 2009 and is a member of the firms Management Committee and Investment Committee. He also heads the Client & Capital Group and is responsible for managing all interactions with the firms investors, as well as its debt financing activities.

He started his career at UBS in London and Hong Kong. He then worked at Lehman Brothers (and following its acquisition, Nomura) where he became Managing Director and Head of the European Corporate & Leveraged Finance group, and was also a member of Lehmans Global High Yield Commitment Committee and European Investment Banking Executive Committee.

Richard graduated from the University of Birmingham.

Sam joined PAI in 2017 as a member of the Investment Group. He has participated in the Amplitude Surgical, Areas, Asmodee and Tropicana transactions.

He started his career at Rothschild & Cie in Paris, where he spent two years as an Investment Banking Analyst.

Sam graduated from Ecole Polytechnique in 2015 (Quantitative Economics & Finance track with HEC Paris), and holds a Masters Degree from Columbia University in Management Science & Engineering.

Olivier joined PAI in 2017 as a member of the Corporate Operations Team.

Prior to joining PAI, Olivier completed several internships in law firms specialised in fund formation and financial services.

Olivier holds a Masters Degree in Business Law from Universit de Strasbourg, and a post-graduate degree in Banking and Financial Law from Universit de Montpellier. Furthermore, Olivier has held the Professional Lawyers Certification (CAPA) since 2017.

Matthew joined PAI in 2020 as a member of the Capital Markets Team in the Client & Capital Group.

He joined PAI from Credit Suisse where he was most recently a Vice President in EMEA Leveraged Finance Capital Markets. Matts role involved underwriting and syndicating primary high-yield bonds and leveraged loans on behalf of private equity backed companies and sub investment grade corporate issuers. Prior to that, Matt held positions in the Financial Institutions Group and Leveraged Finance and Sponsors Group in New-York and in London, having joined the firm in 2014.

Matthew holds a Bachelor of Science from the Haas School of Business at the University of Berkeley in California.

Yannis first joined PAI in 2009 as a member of the Fund Administration Team in Paris. In 2017, he joined Astorg as Head of Valuation and Financial Information based in Luxembourg.

Early 2019, he rejoined PAI as a member of the Corporate Operations Team and is a Conducting Officer for PAI Luxembourg, in charge in particular of valuation.

Before joining PAI, he started his career at PWC Paris as an auditor in the Alternative Investment Funds industry department.

He holds a Masters in Finance from INSEEC Bordeaux.

Joe joined PAI in 2024 as a member of the Investment Group and US Team.

He was previously at H.I.G. Capital, where he spent 9 years as an investor for the Middle Market private equity strategy in New York, focusing on investments across various industries. His experience at H.I.G. includes a 12-month secondment at a portfolio company in St. Louis, Missouri. Prior to H.I.G., Joe began his career as an analyst at Rothschild in New York.

Joe holds a Bachelors in Business Administration from Georgetown University.

Hemant joined PAI in 2022 as a member of the Healthcare Team.

He was previously at JP Morgan Chase, where he spent almost four years in the Healthcare team. Prior to this, Hemant worked for three years in Healthcare with Deutsche Bank and was a consultant with Accenture covering TMT and Healthcare clients for four years.

Hemant holds a Masters degree in Business Administration from Duke University in North Carolina and a BSc in Information Systems and Management and Finance from Singapore Management University.

Yasmine joined PAI in 2022 as a member of the Mid-Market Fund Team. She has been involved in the Beautynova and La Compagnie des Desserts investments.

She joined from Argos Wityu, where she spent over two years working in multiple sectors. Prior to this, Yasmine worked two years in Investment Banking and Transaction Services at PwC and Rothschild.

Yasmine graduated from ESCP. She holds a Masters Degree in Management from the Programme Grande Ecole.

Otto joined PAI in 2020 as a member of the ESG Team.

He was previously with Deloitte and brings six years of experience in sustainability consulting. His focus at Deloitte was on energy, change management, sustainable finance / ESG and the circular economy.

He started his career at the MOITI (Massachusetts Office of International Trade and Investment).

Otto holds a Masters Degree in International Affairs, Economics & Political Science from Northeastern University (Boston).

Lucas joined PAI in 2021 as a member of the Investment Group. He is also part of the DACH Team. He has been involved in the Theramex investment.

Lucas previously worked at BCG in Berlin, first as a generalist consultant with a focus on enterprise strategy and financial analysis across different industries, and then as a member of the BCG Private Equity team.

He holds a MSc in Mathematics from Imperial College London and two BSc in Mathematics and in Physics from the University of Bayreuth.

Frederike joined PAI in 2021 as a member of the ESG Team.

She was previously an intern at PAI within the ESG Team in Paris and Munich and has contributed to a number of projects for the firm.

Frederike holds a MSc in Climate Change, Management and Finance from Imperial College London and a BSc in International Management from Lancaster University and ESB Business School Reutlingen.

Daniel joined PAI in 2021 and is a member of the General Industrials Team. He has been involved in the Infra Group investment.

He joined from H.I.G. Capital where he spent seven years working across a variety of subsectors, primarily in the industrials and business services space. Prior to H.I.G., he worked at McKinsey & Company, where he specialised in similar areas, and Credit Suisses Global M&A team in New York.

Daniel holds a Masters Degree in Business Administration from European Business School Oestrich-Winkel and an MBA with distinction from New York University.

Andreas joined PAI in 2014. He is a member of the DACH and Healthcare teams, and has been involved in several investments including Atos Medical, B&B Hotels, DomusVi, Theramex, Veonet, Xella and Zahneins.

He started his career in private equity at Apax Partners in Munich and London, and also worked at Waterland Private Equity in Dsseldorf.

Andreas graduated with a double degree from the Technical University of Munich (Mathematics) and the Ludwig-Maximilians-University of Munich (Economics).

Marie joined PAI in 2023 as a member of the Food & Consumer Team.

She joined from Eurazeo, where she worked for the Mid-Large Buy-Out Team. She started her career at Credit Suisse in London and New York before joining OpCapita in London.

Marie holds a Masters degree in civil engineering from ESTP and a Masters degree in international finance from HEC Paris.

Lyna joined PAI in 2021 as a member of the Mid-Market Fund Team. She has been involved in the La Compagnie des Desserts investment.

Prior to joining the MMF Team, she completed several internships including in M&A at Lazard Paris and BNP Paribas.

Lyna holds a Masters Degree in Finance and Strategy from Sciences Po Paris, a bachelor in Economics and Social Sciences from Sciences Po Paris as well as a bachelor in Mathematics from La Sorbonne. She completed an exchange year at George Washington University in Washington DC.

Guillaume joined PAI in 2011 and is a member of the Business Services Team. He has been involved in several investments including Apleona, AS Adventure, Euro Media Group, Froneri, Infra Group, Innovista Sensors, Refresco, Roompot and World Freight Company.

Guillaume started his career at Time Equity Partners, a private equity firm involved in growth capital transactions in the technology, media and communications industry.

He graduated from HEC in 2008.

France joined PAI as HR Operations Director.

She brings over 27 years of experience in Human Resources. France joined from AXA Group, where she was successively Human Resources Manager, Director of Social Policy, Training and International Mobility, Group Benefits and Head of Individual Cases. Prior to this, she was Director of Human Resources for three years at Chateau Online, preceded by five years as Human Resources Director at AOL and Compuserve France.

France holds a Master of Business Administration from Burgundy School of Business.

Victoire joined PAI in 2023 as a member of the Investment Group.

She joined from Tikehau Capital, where she spent two years as an Analyst on their graduate program.

Prior to this, Victoire completed internships at Deutsche Bank in London and Lazard in Paris.

Victoire holds a Bachelors degree in International Economics and Finance from Bocconi University, a Masters degree in Management from ESCP Business School, and a Masters Degree in Economics, Corporate Finance and Data Analytics from Ecole Polytechnique.

Christian joined PAI in 2018 as a member of the Investment Group and has been involved in the Atos Medical, Azets, The Compleat Food Group and Refresco investments.

He started his career in the Investment Banking Division of J.P. Morgan in London, where he spent two years, first in the Diversified Industries team and then in the Nordic Corporate Finance and M&A team.

Christian studied International Business at Copenhagen Business School.

Albin joined PAI in 2006 . He is a member of the General Industrials Team and has been involved in a number of investments including ADB Safegate, Alba, Kiloutou, Pasubio, StellaGroup and Xella.

He started his career as a Visiting Associate at the Boston Consulting Group in Paris.

Albin graduated from Ecole Polytechnique in 2002 and holds a Masters Degree from UC Berkeley in Engineering and Project Management, as well as the Management of Technology Certificate from the Haas School of Business.

David joined PAI in 2022 as a member of the Investment Group and the UK Team. He has been involved in the Theramex investment.

Prior to joining the Investment Group, David interned at PAI for one year. He previously spent five years working within the Food and Consumer sector, both as a consultant with Newton Europe, and as an Operations Manager with Oscar Mayer.

David holds a Masters degree in Finance and a BSc in Mathematics with Economics from the London School of Economics.

Achint joined PAI in 2024 as a member of the HR Team in London. Achint joined from Montagu Private Equity LLP, where she worked as a Human Resources generalist covering all key HR functions.

Prior to Montagu, Achint worked as an HR Associate at GIC and as a Talent Acquisition Manager at GreySpark Partners.

Achint holds a Bachelor of Arts in International Relations from Loughborough University.

Santy joined PAI in 2023 and is Head of Data and a member of the PAI Performance Group.

He brings over 10 years of experience in data and artificial intelligence, with a strong focus on deep learning. He joined PAI from Givaudan, where he was AI & Data Lead in the strategy and innovation department. Prior to that he worked in strategy and digital consulting and at Institut Curie as a research engineer.

Santy holds a Masters Degree in Mathematical Modeling & Bioinformatics from Universit Pierre et Marie Curie.

Victor joined PAI in 2022 as a member of the Mid-Market Fund Team. He has been involved in the Uvesco investment.

Prior to joining the MMF Team, he completed several internships including one at PAI, another as a Strategy Consultant at Metyis and two others as a Financial Analyst at Accuracy and EY in Spain.

Victor graduated from Polytechnic University of Catalonia (UPC) with a BEng and MSc in Industrial Engineering and holds a MSc in Management and International Finance from HEC Paris. He also completed an exchange programme at Grenoble INP (UGA) in France.

Juan Jos joined PAI in 2017 as a member of the Investment Group and is also part of the Spanish Team. He has been involved in the World Freight Company and Zahneins transactions.

He started his career at VINCI Concessions structuring infrastructure transactions before joining Rothschild, where he spent two years focusing on M&A, equity and debt financing transactions.

Juan Jos graduated from cole des Ponts ParisTech and Polytechnic University of Catalonia (UPC) with a Masters Degree in Civil Engineering.

Laurent joined PAI in 2022 as Head of Human Resources.

Laurent has significant experience of human resources and talent management at a global level, having worked across three continents. He joined from AXA where he had a long career and spent the last four years leading HR, communication and compliance for more than 25 AXA entities. Previous roles included lead positions at AXA US, AXA Asia and AXA Group.

Prior to AXA he worked at Ford Motor Company both in business and HR roles.

Laurent holds a Masters Degree in Business & HR from KEDGE Business School and HEC Montreal.

Jrmie joined PAI in 2014. He is a member of the General Industrials Team and has been involved in several investments including ADB Safegate, Alba, Atos Medical, SGD Pharma and VPS.

He started his career in strategy consulting at Advancy before joining the Boston Consulting Group, spending one year in the firms private equity practice.

Jrmie graduated from Ecole Polytechnique in 2005 and holds a Masters Degree in Economics from the Paris School of Economics.

Neil joined PAI in 2019 and is a member of the UK Team. He has been involved in the Azets and HKA investments.

He joined PAI from H.I.G. Capital where he spent nine years covering growth equity and leveraged buy-out investments in Europe completing many successful investments, with a particular focus on Industrials, Business Services and FinTech. Previously Neil spent four years at Cinven where he focused on investments in Industrials and Healthcare. He started his career in the Investment Banking Division of Morgan Stanley concentrating on European and UK mergers and acquisitions.

Neil is a graduate of Queens University Belfast where he was awarded M.Sc. with Distinction in Finance and the University of Ulster where he was awarded B.A. Hons First Class in Business Studies.

Matas joined PAI in 2023 as a member of the Investment Group.

He joined from Goldman Sachs where he was an Investment Banking Analyst.

Prior to this, Matas completed internships at PAI and in the M&A team at Natixis Partners.

Matas holds a Masters degree in Management from HEC with a specialisation in Finance.

Maxime joined PAI in 2017 and is a member of the Mid-Market Fund Team.

Maxime has a combined experience in audit of nearly 10 years in Paris and Luxembourg. He worked at Deloitte in Paris for four years and then five years at KPMG in Luxembourg as an Audit Manager within the investment management sector, including private equity structures.

He holds a Masters Degree in Finance from the University of Lyon, with a specialism in private equity and transactions.

Bertrand joined PAI in 2011. He is a member of the Food & Consumer Team and has been involved in a number of investments including Asmodee, Atos, Ecotone, European Camping Group, Euro Ethnic Foods, Froneri, Hunkemller, Labeyrie Fine Foods, Marcolin, Perstorp, Roompot and The Looping Group.

He started his career at the Boston Consulting Group in Paris as a strategy consultant, where he spent two years.

Bertrand graduated from HEC in 2009.

Nicolas joined PAI in 2024 as a member of the Compliance Team.

He previously worked at Finegan, a regulatory consulting firm based in Paris, where he supported private equity firms with their compliance and regulatory matters for seven years. Prior to that, Nicolas was a Compliance Manager at Nordea AM for three years. He started his career in the legal department of BNP Paribas AM, where he worked for five years.

Nicolas holds a Masters degree in European Law from Tours University.

Laura joined PAI in 2007 and heads PAIs Spain Team. She has been involved in several transactions including Areas, DomusVi, Grupo Cortefiel, Grupo Konecta, Swissport, The Nuance Group and Tendam.

She started her career at Merrill Lynch in the Investment Banking department in Madrid, working principally with financial sponsor clients on the execution of buy-side, sell-side and IPO transactions.

Laura graduated in Business Administration and Law from the Universidad Carlos III in Madrid.

Franois Nadin joined PAI in 2016 and is a member of the Corporate Operations Team.

Prior to this, Franois spent five years as senior officer in the private equity industry in a corporate and trust services company in Luxembourg.

Franois graduated from HEC-Ulg (2011) and has a Masters in Business Administration and Finance from Lige.

Anatoliy joined PAI in 2021 as a member of the PAI Performance Group with a particular focus on supply chain & logistics topics.

He brings over 13 years of experience in supply chain & operations gained across management consulting and industry roles. As a Principal at the Boston Consulting Group, he served leading consumer products & retail clients across Europe and Asia. Prior to BCG, Anatoliy held various supply chain roles at Amazon, Tesco and Maersk in the UK.

Anatoliy holds a Master of Science Degree in Logistics & Supply Chain Management from Cranfield University, as well as a Masters Degree in Transportation Management from Odessa National Maritime University in Ukraine.

Denise joined PAI in 2022 as Head of the ESG & Sustainability team. She is responsible for developing PAIs sustainability strategy and creating value through sustainability initiatives in the portfolio.

Denise joined from The World Bank Groups private sector arm IFC, where she spent over 11 years based in the US and Europe. She was Head of Investor Relations & Sustainable Finance Coordination and chaired both the ESG Capital Markets Integration and Sustainable Finance Committees. Denise also served as Chair of the global Green, Social and Sustainability-Linked Bond Principles Steering Committee under ICMA. Denise started her career in the UK, working for Goldman Sachs, GE Capital and Lehman Brothers in various capital market roles.

Denise holds an MBA in Finance from Cornell University and a MSt in Sustainability Leadership from the University of Cambridge. She is an alumna of the Emerging Leaders Program at the Kennedy School of Government, Harvard University.

Shane joined PAI in 2016 and is a member of the Client & Capital Group. He is focused on fundraising, LP coverage and management of the portfolios debt financing activities. Shane was previously Co-Head of the Investment Group from 2018 until 2023.

Shane joined PAI from Credit Suisse where he was most recently a Director in EMEA Leveraged Finance Capital Markets. Shanes role involved underwriting and syndicating primary high-yield bonds and leveraged loans on behalf of private equity backed companies. Prior to that, Shane held a number of roles within Credit Suisses EMEA Leveraged Finance franchise, having joined the firm in 2007.

Drew joined PAI in 2023 and is a member of the Business Services Team and the US Team.

He was previously a Director at 3i Group in New York, focusing on the Business Services, Industrial Technology, and Software sectors.

Prior to this, Drew spent five years with The Carlyle Group, having previously worked at Aurora Capital Group. He started his career on the investment banking team at Goldman Sachs.

Drew holds a BA in Mathematical Economics and International Relations from Pomona College in California and a Master of Business Administration from The Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania.

Isabel joined PAI in 2021 as a member of the Investor Team in the Client & Capital Group.

Isabel has over 14 years of capital raising and investor relations experience across Europe and Asia, having previously worked as a Director in Lazards Private Capital Advisory group and prior to that at MVision Private Equity Advisors. She started her career in London as a consultant at FactSet Europe Limited, a multinational financial data & analytics firm.

Isabel holds a MA in Economics from the University of Edinburgh and a MA in Globalisation & Development from the University of Warwick.

Colm joined PAI in 2006 and heads PAIs UK Team. He has been involved in a number of investments including Azets, Froneri, HKA, Kwik-Fit, M Group Services, The Compleat Food Group, Theramex, United Biscuits and VPS.

He started his career at Hambros Bank in London and New-York working on various debt capital market and advisory transactions. He then moved to Deutsche Bank where he spent eight years in the Financial Sponsors Group working on a number of advisory and financing transactions for European private equity firms.

Colm graduated with a Bachelor of Science Degree (Hons) in Economics from the University of Ulster and has an MBA from the Erasmus University in Rotterdam and Wharton Business School in Philadelphia.

Mathieu joined PAI in 2002 and is the Head of the Business Services Team. He has been involved in a number of investments including Alba, Alphia, Apleona, Armacell, Atos, CEP, Elis, FTE, Global Closure Systems, HKA, Infra Group, IPH, Monier, Saeco, Spie, StellaGroup, The Nuance Group and Xella.

He started his career in the European Acquisition Finance Group at Deutsche Bank and then in the banks Corporate Finance Department in London.

Mathieu graduated from Dauphine University in 1999 as well as Lancaster University, and holds a Masters degree in Finance from Sciences Po Paris.

Mateo joined PAI in 2020 as one of the Founding Partners of the Mid-Market Fund Team. He has been involved in the Angulas Aguinaga and Uvesco investments.

He has strong experience in the Spanish and international private equity markets, having previously been with Ventura Equity Partners, where he was a Founding Partner, and spent close to 12 years at Investindustrial, where he was a Senior Principal in the Spanish office and a member of the Investment Committee. He has also worked as an Investment Executive at Corsabe Capital and started his career in investment banking at Citi.

Mateo holds an MBA from INSEAD and a BSc in Economics from the London School of Economics.

Charlotte joined PAI in 2019 as a member of the Corporate Operations Team. She works in close cooperation with the Investment Group and deal teams on all legal aspects of transactions.

She has over eight years of experience in corporate law, specializing in M&A and private equity. Prior to joining PAI, she worked as an Associate for law firms such as Paul Hastings for six years, and prior to that Latham and Watkins.

Charlotte graduated from ESSEC Business School in 2010, and holds a Masters Degree in Business and Tax Law from the University of Paris II  Panthon Assas. Furthermore, she has held the Professional Lawyers Certification (CAPA) since 2010 and has been admitted to the Paris Bar.

Eloi joined PAI in 2024 as a member of the Corporate Operations Team.

He joined as a Finance Analyst after completing his internship with the Corporate Operations Team in Luxembourg.

Prior to joining PAI, he completed internships at Arthaud & Associs and Ellis Alliance.

Eloi holds a Masters degree in Finance from Universit Lumire Lyon 2 and a Bachelors degree in Economics from Universit Grenoble Alpes.

Caleigh joined PAI in 2021 as a member of the Investment Group and the US Team. She has been involved in the Alphia and Refresco investments.

Caleigh joined from Credit Suisse where she worked within the Global Industrials Group in New York. Prior to that, she completed internships at Credit Suisse and at M2O Private Fund Advisors.

Caleigh holds a Bachelor of Arts in Mathematics and Economics from Amherst College in Massachusetts.

Matthew joined PAI in 2019 as a member of the Investment Group and the UK Team. He has been involved in the Azets, Froneri and The Compleat Food Group investments.

He started his career in the Investment Banking Division of Barclays in London, where he spent four years in the UK M&A advisory team. During his time at Barclays, Matthew also undertook a secondment to UK Government Investments, the governments centre of expertise in corporate finance and governance, where he worked on a number of cross-Whitehall projects and transactions.

Matthew graduated from the University of Bristol with a first class Masters Degree in Engineering.

Harriet joined PAI in 2023 as a member of the Capital Markets Team in the Client & Capital Group.

She joined following almost eight years at HSBC, where she was a VP in the Leveraged and Acquisition Finance team, involved in the underwriting and syndication of leveraged loans and high yield bonds on behalf of private equity backed companies and corporate issuers, including in the Healthcare and Consumer & Retail sectors.

Harriet holds a BSc in Economics from the University of Bristol.

Cline joined PAI in 2021 as a member of the Investment Group. She has been involved in the Alphia and Veonet investments.

She joined from Lazard in Paris, where she spent more than three years in the Investment Banking division working on M&A and financing / restructuring transactions.

Cline holds a Masters Degree in Financial Economics from Columbia Business School and a Masters Degree in Finance from Sciences Po Paris.

David first joined PAI in 2010 as a member of the Corporate Operations Team and then rejoined the firm in 2021 as Head of the Luxembourg office.

In 2017, David left PAI to start his own consultancy firm. He also previously worked for Arthur Andersen and spent a few years in the private equity industry in a corporate and trust services company in Luxembourg.

He holds a Master in Business Administration and Finance from HEC-Ulg (2001).

Laurent joined PAI in 2001 and is a member of the firms Management Committee. He also heads the General Industrials Team. He has been involved in a number of investments including ADB Safegate, Alba, Apave, FTE, Global Closure Systems, Innovista Sensors, Michel Thierry, Pasubio, SGD Pharma and StellaGroup.

He started his career with Bossard Consultants in Paris and then worked for the Investment Banking Division of Goldman Sachs in London.

Laurent graduated from ESSEC in 1990 and holds an MBA from Harvard Business School.

Julia joined PAI in 2020 as a member of the Corporate Operations Team.

She joined from Deloitte Luxembourg where she spent three years as Financial Auditor, focusing on the private equity industry and assurance assignments. Prior to Deloitte, she did an Internship as Financial Auditor in private equity at Mazars Luxembourg.

She holds a Masters degree in Accounting and Audit from EM Strasbourg Business School.

Chiara joined PAI in 2024 as a member of the Investment Group.

She joined from Goldman Sachs in London where she worked for two years as an Analyst in the EMEA Healthcare Team. Prior to this, she interned at JP Morgan, Goldman Sachs and Berenberg.

Chiara holds a Masters degree in Finance from HEC Paris and a Bachelor in Economics from the University of St. Gallen.

Luisa joined PAI in 2022 as a member of the Investor Team in the Client & Capital Group.

She joined from Pantheon Ventures, where she spent almost two years as an Investor Relations Analyst. Luisa started her career in strategy consulting with a focus on the healthcare sector at Mansfield Advisors.

Luisa holds a Masters Degree in Management from the London School of Economics and a BA in Business Management from the University of Exeter.

Maximilian joined PAI in 2021 as a member of the Mid-Market Fund Team. He has been involved in the European Pizza Group investment.

He joined from Gilde Buy Out Partners where he worked for two years with a focus on mid-market transactions in the DACH region, having started his career at Gilde Healthcare Partners. He has worked on several transactions in the Healthcare and TMT sectors.

Maximilian graduated from Kings College London and holds a Master in Accounting and Finance from the University of St Gallen in Switzerland.

Trevor joined PAI in 2017. He is a member of the Food & Consumer Team and the US Team. He has been involved in the Alphia, Froneri and Refresco transactions.

Previously, Trevor was an associate at Water Street Healthcare Partners, a Chicago-based middle market private equity firm. Prior to joining Water Street, he was an investment banking analyst in the healthcare group at Citi in New York.

Trevor holds a Bachelors degree from the University of Notre Dame in Economics.

Chlo joined PAI in 2019 as a member of the Corporate Operations Team.

Prior to this, Chlo started her career as a legal advisor in an official receivers office in Paris. She was in charge of the supervision of administration and liquidation procedures.

In 2016, Chlo received a Masters degree in Insolvency Law from the University of Nice Sophia Antipolis.

Dania joined PAI in 2022 as Head of Communications and is responsible for overseeing the firms communications strategy with internal and external audiences.

Previously, she led external communications and thought leadership for a global business unit at Mastercard, advancing trust across the companys brand, products, services and digital ecosystem.

Dania began her career at Brunswick, where she worked for over a decade, advising some of the worlds largest companies on financial and corporate communications and critical issues, including crises, high-profile and contested transactions, shareholder activism, strategic reviews and change management.

Dania was educated at Oxford University.

Francesca joined PAI in 2024 as a member of the Investment Group.

She previously worked at L-GAM Advisers in London. Prior to L-GAM, she worked in the Special Situations team at KKR for three years and spent two years at Houlihan Lokey in the Restructuring Group.

Francesca holds a Bachelors degree from Bocconi and a Masters degree from ESCP.

Alexander joined PAI in 2021 as a member of the Mid-Market Fund Team. He has been involved in the European Pizza Group investment.

He joined from Goldman Sachs in London, where he spent six years in the banks Private Equity division and was involved in numerous equity investment opportunities across a broad spectrum of industries.

Alexander graduated from the University of St. Gallen HSG in Switzerland and holds a Master of Science in International Finance from HEC.

Germaine joined PAI in 2024 as a member of the Investor Team in the Client & Capital Group.

She joined following almost three years at BDA Partners London, where she worked as an Investment Banking Associate. She was actively involved in transactions in the Consumer and Retail, Industrials and Services sector.

Prior to that, she completed internships at Macquarie Capital and KPMG.

Germaine holds a Bachelor of Arts in International Relations from Durham University.

Dekel joined PAI in 2020 as a member of the Investment Group and the US Team.

Previously, Dekel was an associate at KKR in their Americas Consumer & Retail private equity group. Prior to joining KKR, he was an analyst at Moelis & Company in Los Angeles.

Dekel holds a Bachelor of Science in Finance from the University of Southern California.

Stefano joined PAI in 2019 as a member of the Investment Group and the Italy Team. He has been involved in the Pasubio investment.

He joined from OpCapita LLP, a European consumer-focused private equity firm based in London, where he spent two years. Previously, Stefano spent two years at the Boston Consulting Group, as a consultant, and one year at Morgan Stanley in its Investment Banking Division, in London.

He holds an MBA from the London Business School and a Master of Science in International Management from Bocconi University.

Berre joined PAI in 2018 as a member of the Investment Group. She has been involved in the Ecotone and Theramex investments.

She started her career in the Investment Banking Division of Rothschild in London where she spent five years.

Berre graduated from the Erasmus University Rotterdam with a Master of Science in Financial Economics.

Sirine joined PAI in 2021 as a member of the Investment Group. She has been involved in the European Camping Group and Infra Group investments.

She joined from Deutsche Bank in Paris where she spent more than three years working on several merger & acquisitions and financing mandates.

Sirine holds a double degree in International Business (CEMS) from HEC.

Winston joined PAI in 2022 and leads PAIs consumer activities in North America. He has been involved in the Alphia investment.

He was previously at Vestar Capital Partners, where he spent 14 years, most recently as a Managing Director and Co-Head of Consumer, in addition to serving as a Director on a number of consumer, food and beverage companies.

Prior to Vestar, Winston was a member of the Leveraged Finance team at Lehman Brothers and the secondaries team at CSFB Private Equity.

Winston holds a Bachelors degree in Economics-Political Science from Columbia University, and a Masters in Business Administration from The Wharton School of Business at the University of Pennsylvania.

Frdric is a member of PAIs Management Committee. He also chairs the firms Investment Committee and Heads the Healthcare Team.

He first joined the firm in 1993 and spent five years in the then Food & Beverage Team. In 1998, he joined Deutsche Bank / Bankers Trust in the European Acquisition Finance Group as a Director and subsequently as Managing Director. In June 2001, he returned to PAI, where he has been involved in a large number of transactions including Alphia, Atos Medical, B&B Hotels, Cerba Healthcare, Chr. Hansen, DomusVi, Elis, ELITechGroup, Ethypharm, Froneri, Kaufman & Broad, Labeyrie Fine Foods, Marcolin, Panzani-Lustucru, Refresco, Roompot, Provimi, Saeco, United Biscuits and Yoplait.

Frdric studied at ESCP and started his career with Banque Paribas in the Advisory team of the Private Banking division.

Max joined PAI in 2023 as a member of the Investment Group. He has been involved in the Apleona investment.

He joined from L-GAM in London, where he worked for five years on transactions across Europe in various sectors. Prior to L-GAM, Max worked for three years at McKinsey in Munich.

Max holds a Bachelors degree in International Relations from Georgetown University and an MBA with distinction from the Wharton School.

Henri joined PAI in 2018 as a member of the Investment Group. He has been involved in the Alba, Asmodee, HKA, SGD Pharma and StellaGroup investments.

He started his career at the Boston Consulting Group in Paris as a strategy consultant, where he spent two years.

Henri graduated from HEC in 2015.

Valentin joined PAI in 2024 as a member of the Corporate Operations Team.

Before joining PAI, he spent four years as a Chief Operating Officer for the Private bankings Private Equity platform at Rothschild & Co. Prior to this, he worked as a Transaction Services Analyst at Deloitte for two years.

Valentin holds a Masters degree in Financial Engineering from Sorbonne Universit.

Franck joined PAI in 2011 as a member of the Portfolio Performance Group.

He started his career at Procter & Gamble with management roles at manufacturing facilities in France, Italy and the US. After seven years at P&G, he joined the Operations Practice at McKinsey & Co., focusing on manufacturing, supply chain and capital expenditure, serving clients in the industrial and consumer goods sectors.

Franck studied Innovation and Production Systems at the Ecole Centrale Paris.

Arnaud van Tichelen joined PAI in 2017. He is a member of the Healthcare Team, and has been involved in the ELITechGroup, Veonet and Zahneins transactions.

He started his career at UBS in London, where he spent three years working in the Consumer & Retail M&A team. He then spent three years at the Canada Pension Plan Investment Board (CPPIB) in the Direct Private Equity team in London.

Arnaud holds a double degree in Business Administration from the ICADE Madrid and the Reims Management School with a major in Finance.

Zofta joined PAI in 2014. She started out at PAI as a Personal Assistant in the Food & Consumer Team and is now an Accountant in the Corporate Operations Team.

As part of her role, she is in charge of PAIs invoice payment process as well as accounting work with the firms chartered accountants.

Zofta holds a degree in Accounting & Finance from Newcastle University.

Miguel joined PAI in 2023 as a member of the Mid-Market Fund Team.

He joined from L-GAM, where he spent over two years as an Investment Associate in the London office. Prior to that, he worked as a Consultant at The Boston Consulting Group in Spain for more than three years.

Miguel holds an MBA from Columbia Business School and a Bachelors degree in aerospace engineering from Universidad Politcnica de Madrid.

Sebastien initially joined PAI in 2008 and then rejoined the firm as a member of the Healthcare Team in 2021 after a five year break at Advent International, where he was in charge of healthcare and business services investments in the French market. Sbastien has been involved in a number of investments including CEP, Cerba Healthcare, ELITechGroup, Ethypharm, Grupo Konecta, Kiloutou, Theramex, Veonet and VPS.

Sbastien has also worked as an Adviser to the French President on social issues and he started his career as a judge at the French Supreme Court of Administrative Justice (Conseil dEtat), with a specialty in healthcare law.

Sbastien graduated with a Master of Public Administration from ENA, a Masters degree in Political Science from Sciences Po and a Master of Science in Economics from ENS.

Thomas joined PAI in 2021 as a member of the Investment Group and the UK Team.

He worked previously at Bain & Company where he spent three years as a Consultant in the Private Equity Group focusing on a variety of transactions in different sectors.

Thomas holds a Masters degree in Cognitive and Decision Sciences from University College London, and a Bachelors Degree in Liberal Arts and Sciences from University College Maastricht. He is fluent in Dutch and English, and conversational in Spanish and German.

Lynda join PAI in 2021 as a member of the Corporate Operations Team.

Prior to joining PAI, Lynda spent six years as a Paralegal covering Southern Europe at Prologis. She was also previously a Paralegal within the M&A department of Canal+ and Cofigeo. Prior to her legal experiences, Lynda worked as a sales and key account manager for various companies.

Lynda holds a Masters in Legal and Tax from CFP Panthon Assas Paris and a Bachelor in Business Law from (La) Sorbonne.

Raffaele joined PAI in 2002 as a member of the Italy Team and has been involved in a number of investments including Beautynova, European Pizza Group, Gruppo Coin, La Compagnie des Desserts, Marcolin, Saeco, Scrigno, The Nuance Group and Uvesco. In 2020, he became one of the Founding Partners of the Mid-Market Fund Team.

Raffaele started his career in the Corporate Finance department of Chase Manhattan Bank in New York, London and Milan. In 1993, he became one of the Founding Partners of Vitale Borghesi & Co, which became part of the Lazard Group in 1998.

Raffaele graduated from Rollins College (USA) in Business Administration.

Jessica joined PAI in 2023 as a member of the HR Team, with a specific focus on talent management & HR development.

She previously worked at Ardian, where she was HR Development Senior Manager and HR Business Partner for the international investment and support functions. Jessica brings more than eleven years of experience in recruitment, learning & development management and in promoting diversity & inclusion in the workplace. She started her career at Sagem.

Jessica holds a Bachelors degree from EBS and a Master of Human Resources from PPA.

Sverine joined PAI in 2019 as a member of the Portfolio Performance Group with a specific focus on talent, leadership and culture.

She has extensive experience in Executive Search and Leadership Consulting helping leaders make the right decisions about the recruitment, assessment and development of talents, the constitution of efficient management teams and corporate governance.

She spent the early part of her career in M&A and Corporate Finance at Goldman Sachs and as an investment professional at Vestar Capital Partners and Candover.

She is a graduate from the Solvay Business School and holds an MBA from INSEAD. She is also a certified Executive Coach.

Brett joined PAI in 2024 as a member of the Investment Group.

He joined from Barclays where he worked within the Financial Institutions Group in New York.

Brett holds a Bachelor of Arts in Applied Statistics & Economics from the University of Virginia.

Samuel joined PAI in 2023 as a member of the Investor Team in the Client & Capital Group.

He joined from Apax Partners, where he spent almost three years in the Investor Relations team. Prior to that, he worked in Corporate Finance at KPMG for four years.

Samuel holds a Bachelors degree in Economics from LSE and is a qualified accountant (ACA).

Emil joined PAI in 2022 as a member of the Investment Group. He has been involved in the NovaTaste investment.

He joined from Deutsche Beteiligungs AG, a mid-market private equity fund focusing on the DACH region and Italy, where he has spent over 5 years working on several investments, exits and refinancing processes.

He holds a MSc in Mathematical Finance and a BSc in Mathematics from the Technical University of Munich (TUM).
